title: bitcoinjesus88
author: bitcoinjesus88
content: Stumbled over a website called comfyco.us they sell unique furniture, bean bags, sofas, bedding, and pillows. They accept bitcoin & Ethereum which is huge because furniture is a necessity to most people living in homes. But the thing I like about Comfyco.us is how its a unique selection, it's not the standard furniture store they mix in some really neat designs and it's a mix of expensive and affordable. The biggest part is the bitcoin, this is a step closer of what we all want. Bitcoin has the power to be king of all currencies it's just a matter of time. Companies like comfyco.us are bringing us a step closer to that horizon of where all of us want to be. I bought the ball sofa, couple bean bags, pillow, and my most favorite the enigma sofa.

comments.author: alex damon
comments.body: Thanks for the notice Im in need of some new furniture and I want to use Bitcoin to purchase it so thanks for the update.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Furniture prices may vary between countries, but I don't remember seeing a sofa for $5000, the average price here is between $500 and $3,000.The design of the website looks like a template with pictures on itIn general, it is good to have options like PayPal because scammers often avoid them but they need a lot to gain trust

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on June 23, 2022, 08:25:05 AMFurniture prices may vary between countries, but I don't remember seeing a sofa for $5000, the average price here is between $500 and $3,000.The design of the website looks like a template with pictures on itIn general, it is good to have options like PayPal because scammers often avoid them but they need a lot to gain trustI've been doing some couch shopping lately.  I'm actually surprised at the sticker shock.  I think I paid $2,000 for my couches/tables/lamps last time I was shopping for living room furniture.  Recently I've seen couches by themselves for up to $8,000.  It seems impossible to find anything decent for under $3,000.  Silly me thought I'd be able to walk out with a nice couch for under $2,000, but I don't think that's possible anymore.  I'm starting to feel like an old man yelling at clouds with this Biden inflation.  I can't even imagine what things will be like in another 10-20 years.  Retirement is going to be a fairytale.
